Toaster.description: Top-level container for all toaster database objects.

___toasterManufacturer.description:
The name of the toaster's manufacturer. For instance, 
                Microsoft Toaster.

___toasterModelNumber.description:
The name of the toaster's model. For instance,
               Radiant Automatic.

___allow-user.description: A list of user name patterns to allow

___toasterStatus.description:
This variable indicates the current state of 
               the toaster.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Pet object that needs to be added to the store

operations.notes:
Stop making toast, if any is being made.
           A 'resource-denied' error will be returned 
           if the toaster service is disabled.

Make some toast.
           The toastDone notification will be sent when 
           the toast is finished.
           An 'in-use' error will be returned if toast
           is already being made.
           A 'resource-denied' error will be returned 
           if the toaster service is disabled.
